original_text: Barnabas and I seem to be the only leaders who must work at other jobs. We should not need to do that!
korean_text: 어찌 나와 바나바만 일하지 아니할 권리가 없겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Barnabas and I seem to be the only leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 바나바와 내가 유일한 지도자인 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: who must work at other jobs
We should not need to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그렇게 할 필요가 없어야 합니다
